name: Limousine Car Driver Simulator 3D – Drive the luxury limo & take the vip guests on city tour
name_original: Limousine Car Driver Simulator 3D – Drive the luxury limo & take the vip guests on city tour
description:
Drive the limo in this limousine simulator game and feel the vip luxury in this dream car. In this simulation game your task is to pick up the vip guests from the airport and bring them to the hotel. That’s not it you also need to give the guest a tour of the city. Drive carefully in the city jam pack roads and complete the city journey in time. You also need to take care of the car and take it to the garage for repair and service work.

This simulation game is consisting of 15 challenging road tour journeys with multiple tasks to achieve in limited time. Further this game will entertain you with realistic 3D graphics and high quality background sounds which will surely boost up your gaming experience.

Features
• 15 extreme levels of driver duty.
• Very smooth and realistic controls to boost your game play.
• Multiple tasks to do including pick and drop and car service.
• Lifelike graphics and high quality sounds.
• User friendly interface.
